title: IDSPBRMaterial.FlakeCoverage
description: Gets or sets the flake coverage of this material.
remarks:
For more information about this property:
Open https://dassaultsystemes-technology.github.io/EnterprisePBRShadingModel/spec-2025x.md.html in an internet browser, click CTRL-F and type "Flake coverage" in the pop up. Click
Next result
repeatedly.
Search for "flake coverage in materials science" on the web.
